name: Roller Wrecker
description:
A shooter where moving also rotates you.   You shoot two shots at a time, one blue and one red.  You can only kill blue enemies with blue shots and red enemies with red shots.   You have 60 seconds to get as much score as you can.

Install Information:

  1. Download Zip
  2. Extract Zip
  3. Don't the touch the Roller_Wrecker Data folder
  4. Open the exe file

Made it in one weekend for the GMTK JAM
